00019 #ifndef SONFILEHEADER_H
00020 #define SONFILEHEADER_H
00021 
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include <fstream>
00024 #include <stdint.h>
00025 
00026 class SONFile;
00027 
00028 using namespace std;
00029 
00033 class SONFileHeader
00034 {
00035         friend class SONExtractor;
00036         friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& out,const SONFileHeader& fileHeader);
00037 
00038         public:
00043         SONFileHeader(SONFile *file);
00047                 virtual ~SONFileHeader();
00051                 virtual void read();
00056                 virtual inline int16_t getNChannels() const;
00061                 virtual inline int16_t getSystemID() const;
00066                 virtual inline double getSecondsPerTick() const;
00071                 virtual inline uint16_t getTimePerADC() const;
00072 
00073         private:
00074 
00075                 SONFile         *file;
00076                 int16_t         systemID;
00077                 char                    copyright[10+1];
00078                 char                    creator[8+1];
00079                 uint16_t                usPerTime;
00080                 uint16_t                timePerADC;
00081                 int16_t         fileState;
00082                 int32_t         firstData;
00083                 int16_t         nChannels;
00084                 uint16_t                channelSize;
00085                 uint16_t                extraData;
00086                 uint16_t                bufferSize;
00087                 uint16_t                osFormat;
00088                 int32_t         maxFTime;
00089                 double          timeBase;
00090                 struct
00091                 {
00092                         char                    detail[6];
00093                         uint16_t                year;
00094                 } timeDate;
00095                 char                    pad[52];
00096                 char                    *fileComment[5];
00097 };
00098 
00099 int16_t SONFileHeader::getNChannels() const
00100 {
00101         return nChannels;
00102 }
00103 
00104 int16_t SONFileHeader::getSystemID() const
00105 {
00106         return systemID;
00107 }
00108 
00109 // See note on time units in sonfile.h
00110 double SONFileHeader::getSecondsPerTick() const
00111 {
00112         return usPerTime * timeBase;
00113 }
00114 
00115 // See note on time units in sonfile.h
00116 uint16_t SONFileHeader::getTimePerADC() const
00117 {
00118         return timePerADC;
00119 }
